description:
Originally developed by Digital Pictures in 1987
and released in 1992, Night Trap has been
completely rebuilt, bringing it to a level of
video quality never before seen.

Night Trap tells the story of five teenage girls
spending the weekend at the Martin home. As a
member of the Special Control Attack Team, your
job is to monitor the home and protect the girls
using an intricate system of cameras and traps as
it is being invaded by vampires.

Night Trap - 25th Anniversary Edition also
includes new features such as deleted scenes, two
documentaries, the all-new Theater that allows you
to watch all story-related videos uninterrupted, a
new mode called Survivor that will test your
skills at trapping intruders and behind the scenes
production images. For the first time ever, the
unreleased prototype Scene Of The Crime will be
fully playable and included with Night Trap - 25th
Anniversary Edition.
name: Night Trap - 25th Anniversary Edition
